description: Video.js is a JavaScript and CSS library that makes it easier to work with and build on HTML5 video, today. This is also known as an "HTML5 Video Player". Video.js provides a common controls skin built in HTML/CSS, fixes cross-browser inconsistencies, adds additional features like fullscreen and subtitles, manages the fallback to Flash or other playback technologies when HTML5 video isn't supported, and also provides a consistent JavaScript API for interacting with the video.
name: Video.js
